text:
(Before It's News)
By Lisa Haven
We all knew a “fight” was going to be rising from those on the far left, however we didn’t realize it would be a physical one; one in which they train to “Bash The Fash.”
The college campus at the University of Central Florida is now allowing a “Leftist Fight Club” to thrive and train to combat against republicans and Trump supporters. Sadly, the university sees no problem in allowing this group to continue in their stupidity. Instead of stopping the violence, they promote it, which tells me we could be looking at some serious issues in the very near future.
But that’s not the only thing the leftists and their Globalist leaders are pushing. Deagel.com has once again decreased the American population by showing a drastic decrease from 321 million to 61 million persons by the year 2025.
What you are about to see in the video below reveals all the above and MUCH more… Please don’t miss this CRUCIAL report….
